name: Lucky Whale Casino

verdict.text: Lucky Whale Casino positions itself as a strong contender in the online gaming world, offering a diverse selection of over 3,000 slots, table games, and live dealer games from providers like Pragmatic Play Live and Evolution Gaming.  The platform stands out with its extensive game library, generous welcome bonuses, and commitment to responsible gambling.  Licensed by an unspecified authority, Lucky Whale Casino implements security measures such as SSL encryption and secure payment gateways to protect player data and transactions.  The casino offers a 100% welcome bonus or a VIP welcome bonus of 125% up to $10,000 (capped at $1,500 winnings), though terms and conditions apply, and regional variations may exist. Payment options include major providers and cryptocurrencies, with withdrawals typically processed within an unspecified timeframe, subject to daily ($50,000), weekly ($5,000), and monthly ($20,000) limits. Mobile compatibility allows players to enjoy games on the go with full functionality. While Lucky Whale Casino excels in game variety and bonus offers, areas for potential improvement include clarifying licensing details, specifying withdrawal processing times, and providing more detailed information on payment methods. Customer support is readily available 24/7 via live chat, email, and contact form. For the most up-to-date details on games, promotions, and services, visit https://www.luckywhalecasino.com/.

security.title: Is Lucky Whale Casino Safe?
security.description: While Lucky Whale Casino states its commitment to responsible gambling, the specific licensing authority remains unspecified.  The casino's security infrastructure includes standard measures such as SSL encryption and secure payment gateways to protect player information and financial transactions. Responsible gambling tools such as self-help resources, links to support organizations, and self-exclusion options are available. Payment security measures include utilizing established payment processors and potentially employing fraud prevention systems. Data protection policies and account security features, including password protection and two-factor authentication, are likely in place, but require further clarification. Specific details on player protection policies, banking security measures, and problem gambling prevention tools beyond self-exclusion are not readily available. Third-party certifications and audits are not mentioned.  For detailed information, players should consult the casino's terms and conditions or contact customer support.
